page.title: 20Life Styles-Graffitti
page.content: a spirit-based ink are very hard to remove without recourse to other chemicals. The second type of message involves some kind of social or political demand. Where an individual has been wrongly imprisonned, then a message may read "JIMMY IS INNOCENT" in an attempt to gain publicity. There are few political requests apart from those towards the extremes: "SMASH CAPITALISM" may appear with "WHITE POWER" nearby. These demands may possibly be the work of adults rather than children; they differ as well in that they are usually spray painted onto prominant walls or even onto bridges.
